
public class Q8_Java_Ass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Even Number");
		for(int i=0; i<=10; i++)
		{
			if(i % 2 == 0)
			{
				System.out.println(i);
			}
		}

	}

}


Output:-
Even Number
0
2
4
6
8
10
